alert.note: Alert for Logan; Scott; Yell (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 31 at 11:28PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Logan, northeastern Scott and west central Yell Counties through 1215 AM CST... At 1127 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Waldron, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Waldron... Blue Mountain... Stonehouse Recreation Area... Cardiff... Union Hill... Olio... Sugar Grove... Grayson... Blue Ball... Needmore... Waltreak... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 600 AM CST for western and central Arkansas.
